summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with the Butterfly Trust for the period from October 1, 2014, to October 31, 2014. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $800,000.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $800,000 was made from the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $800,000 to First Bank, Puerto Rico.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $5.75 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $8,054.54 on October 1, 2014.
A total of $800,000 was transferred out of the account on October 30, 2014.
The ending balance of the account as of October 31, 2014, was $8,060.29.
No service charges were incurred during the statement period.
The document is marked as confidential and includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions.
